summary: An opium-addicted choirmaster develops an obsession for a beautiful young girl and will not stop short of murder in order to have her.
cast: Claude Rains|Douglass Montgomery|Heather Angel|David Manners|Francis L. Sullivan|Valerie Hobson|Zeffie Tilbury|Ethel Griffies|E.E. Clive|Walter Kingsford|Forrester Harvey|Veda Buckland|Elsa Buchanan|George Ernest|J.M. Kerrigan|Bunny Beatty|May Beatty|Evelyn Beresford|Walter Brennan|Rosita Butler|Louise Carter|Edward Cooper|Harry Cording|D'Arcy Corrigan|Anne Darling|Gordon Douglas|Effie Ellsler|Will Geer|Helena Grant|Anne Harrison|George Kirby|Carla Laemmle|Dora Mayfield|Iris Moore|Corbet Morris|Anne O'Neal|Helen Parrish|Barbara Perry|Dorothy Shearer|Eugene Strong|Lois Verner|Lloyd Whitlock
title: Mystery of Edwin Drood
